title.us: Web Scraping Tesla revenues with Python and Beautiful Soup
title.es: Haciendo web Scraping a Tesla con Python y Beautiful Soup

description.us: Use python and the beautiful soup library to download, scrape, clean and visualize the revenue information from Tesla
